abilities.desc: After you Push, you may Teleport to an empty space adjacent to the target of that Push.
At the start of your turn, you may Push 3 to an obstacle, ally, or enemy within range.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

actions.name: Nitro Boost
actions.desc:
Teleport 2, then gain 2 Speed tokens.
6+: Teleport 2, then gain 3 Speed tokens

actions.name: Rocket Tackle
actions.desc:
Push 2 to someone within range.
5 Speed: If they are an ally, they Move up to 3. If they are an enemy, Push 2 and deal 2 damage to them.
Usable once per turn.
